comments.comment: This game gave me chills! The atmosphere is insane. Did anyone else notice the hidden figure in the mirror at 2:34?
Bro, those jump scares are on point! I nearly fell out of my chair! Also, is that the same music from the developer's old game hidden in the background?
The lighting and sound design are top-notch. Really pulls you in! Also, did you see that creepy doll in the corner at 5:17? Definitely an easter egg!
This gameplay is so intense! I was on the edge of my seat the whole time. Btw, love the reference to 'The Shining' at 3:42!
Damn, this game looks terrifying. The pacing is perfect for a horror game. And did anyone catch that hidden message in the static noise?
I love how immersive the environment is. You feel like you're right there! That secret room behind the bookshelf at 12:45 was so cool!
The storytelling in this game is incredible! So dark and mysterious. Did you hear the creepy whispering at 6:23? Gave me goosebumps!
I'm not even playing and I feel scared watching this! Great work. That ghost in the background at 9:15 was subtle but so creepy!
The tension builds up so well in this game. It's like a movie but scarier! Btw, anyone else notice the '404 Error' graffiti at 10:08? LOL!
These graphics are unreal for a horror game from this era! And the way you found that hidden key at 8:34, pure genius!
The sound effects make this game SO creepy. I'm literally shaking. Oh, and the hidden message in the painting at 11:29? Chilling!
That monster design is just terrifying. Hats off to the devs! Also, that hidden hallway at 7:52? Thought I was imagining things!
The jump scares are perfectly timed. Can't wait to play this myself. And the secret level you unlocked? Insane!
This game nails the horror vibe. I can’t believe I missed it back in the day! Did anyone else see that figure in the window at 4:18? Totally missed it on my first watch!
Wow, the AI in this game is brutal. Makes it even more terrifying. Also, love the subtle nod to 'Resident Evil' with the typewriter at 3:05!
I love how the atmosphere builds slowly and then suddenly scares the life out of you! The hidden room you unlocked at 6:47? Creepiest moment ever.
The ambient music is perfect for setting up the horror. Loving this gameplay! Btw, that cryptic code on the wall at 7:19? Wonder what it means!
This gameplay footage is amazing! Totally worth the watch. The tension is unreal. Anyone else spot the hidden skull in the fireplace at 5:33?
I'm not brave enough to play this, but watching it is seriously entertaining. That easter egg referencing the developer’s last game at 2:55? Epic!
The way you handled that boss fight was epic! Great playthrough. Also, that old-school game poster in the background at 9:09? Awesome nod!
